scikits.statsmodels.family.links.Link¶

class scikits.statsmodels.family.links.Link¶

A generic link function for one-parameter exponential family.

Link does nothing, but lays out the methods expected of any subclass.

Methods

inverse(z)
deriv(p)
call Return the value of the link function g(p) = z
